description: Try our easy to follow Mulgowie Microwavable Corn Cobbettes In A Garlic & Herb Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steamed vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Microwave,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Easter,Peanut free
name: Mulgowie Microwavable Corn Cobbettes In A Garlic & Herb Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place corn cobbettes in the microwave following the on-pack guidelines.
Microwave for 5 minutes. Be careful when removing from microwave as these will be hot.
Mix melted butter, garlic and optional parsley in a bowl. Brush corn cobbettes with butter mixture when hot, letting the butter melt into the cobbettes.
Allow to cool slightly until warm enough to eat.
